description: What better way to give a long-overdue tribute to the 3 Stooges than by giving them their own "mock" awards show. Hosted by Martin Short, this hilarious look at the geniuses of comedy combines everything you could want from great ...
name: The Three Stooges Greatest Hits

original_info.id: The Three Stooges: Greatest Hits & Rarities_1932
original_info.name: The Three Stooges: Greatest Hits & Rarities

review.name: The Three Stooges Greatest hits and recreations of some scenes too.+
review.reviewBody:
Yes this special was on the night of my 34th Birthday on May 15th,1997.My Younger Brother Mark told me that it was going to be on and so that was last secondish when he told me and in a pinch I got to record it but misplaced the VHS Tape too. There were scenes recreating the scenes of Stooge features blending the then with the now but you must watch it to see and understand it for yourself. There was also a scene of Barry Williams a.k.a. "Greg Brady"singing The Stooges three the stooges three that's the way they remain the Stooges three to the tune of "The Brady Bunch The Brady Bunch that's the way we became The Brady Bunch."Maybe by Barry's meaning of That's the way they remain The Stooges three and even though there are 6 team members or 7 if you count Emil Sitka and how they were only 3 at each time that they appeared.There's even an entry in my Brady Bunch Book of Three Stooges Haircuts too.

Truly,Stephen "Steve" G. Baer a.k.a."Ste" of Framingham,MA.USA.
